Buffer DeflateStream::deflate ( const char *  data,
int  size,
int &  deflatedSize,
int  compressLevel 
) [static]

Deflate a buffer in a single run.

The returned buffer may be larger than necessary: deflatedSize is set to the number of bytes actually used.
